partners.name: Partners
partners.title: They trust us
partners.subtitle: Our trusted partners who accompany us in our mission to digitally transform Africa.

hero.title: AFRO Group
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for financial innovation in Africa
hero.description: We develop advanced technological solutions to democratize access to financial and educational services across the African continent.

company.title: Our Mission
company.description: AFRO Group is a technology company dedicated to financial and educational innovation in Africa. We create solutions that transform how Africans access financial services and education.
company.visionText: To become the leader in technological innovation in Africa, creating an inclusive and accessible financial and educational ecosystem for all.

fined.title: FinEd
fined.subtitle: Digital Financial Education
fined.description: FinEd is much more than an app: an intelligent platform that teaches you to master your money while giving you digital tools to manage your daily finances.

featuresDescription.education: Interactive modules covering the basics of financial management, investing, saving, and more.
featuresDescription.tools: Practical tools to track your expenses, set budgets, and plan your financial goals.
featuresDescription.community: Join a community of learners to share tips, ask questions, and progress together.
featuresDescription.ai: An AI-powered virtual assistant to answer your financial questions and guide you in your learning.

beta.title: BETA Consulting
beta.subtitle: Digital transformation consulting
beta.description: BETA Consulting advises and guides companies and institutions in their digital transformation through blockchain, offering in-depth expertise in the financial, logistics, and administrative sectors.

servicesDescription.training: Development of IT Blockchain solutions tailored to your realities.
servicesDescription.strategy: Training and support for your professional teams.
servicesDescription.implementation: Support and advice on blockchain strategy.

beta.footer: Explore how BETA Consulting can transform your business with blockchain expertise.

blog.title: News & Insights
blog.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest trends

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Are you a business or institution looking to collaborate, contribute, or benefit from our innovative solutions? Contact us today and let's build impactful projects for Africa together.

footer.description: AFRO Group - Shaping Africa's future through finance, technology, and education.
